actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, of the United States Code to provide for cost-of-living increases in educational benefits.

summary.text: Increases specified veterans' educational benefits by the percentage increase in the Consumer Price Index in any calendar quarter in which the Administrator of Veterans Affairs determines that the consumer price index has risen by at least three percent.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, of the United States Code to provide for cost-of-living increases in educational benefits.
